headline: Grammy's Easy Blackberry Cobbler
name: Grammy's Easy Blackberry Cobbler
description: Three ingredients make this blackberry dump cobbler one of the easiest to put together.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Spread blackberries into a 9x13-inch glass baking dish.
Place cake mix into a large bowl. Mix in butter until mixture resembles cornmeal. Sprinkle evenly over blackberries.
Bake in the preheated oven until blackberries are tender and topping is golden brown, about 30 minutes.
